TopicTitle: Some of my ideas for colonies.

Articles.Content:
im gonna keep this short and simple

 

Ive been thinking that what if for colonies on low gravity bodies you could use a mass accelorator like system to get stuff into orbit, and it could work like runways where its a modular design and the more "mass accelorator track" you have the better your chances for getting into orbit/faster you go to get into high/low orbits.

Ive also been thinking what if for planets/gas giants with dense atmospheres you could have floating colonies/airships, in fact if you have one in a gasgiant this could be how you get mettalic hydrogen and it would make launches to orbit easy if its on a planet like eve.

 

 

 

 

thank you for coming to my ted talk
